landing.about_content: Analytics Center is a personal productivity platform designed to help you monitor and improve your daily activities. Created as an academic project to explore data analysis, task management, and productivity optimization.

features.title: Key Features
features.tasks_description: Organize and track your tasks efficiently.
features.events_description: Plan and manage your events effectively.

CTA.title: Get Started Today!
